title: _livecasino.io_
author: _livecasino.io_
content: Hello BitcoinTalk Community!This new Livecasino.io Promo is for 1 mBTC Free bet to Bombay Club Baccarat by Evolution!!!Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk Promo #30 will work like this:Reward 1 mBTC Free bet to Bombay Club Baccarat by Evolution!How?Opt-in by sending PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BitcoinTalk promo #30 as PM subject to facilitate the management)Make at least 1 depositWager at least 10 mBTC on any games at Livecasino.io!Promo durationThis Promo will be running from the moment of this post, until Sunday 4th September 23:59 GMTRulesAll BitcoinTalk users can participateMulti accounts will not be eligible for the reward The reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Monday 5th September, 17:00 GMTAll bets and winnings will be withdrawable from the freebetDue to Game Providers country restrictions, some participants may have to receive a different, but equivalent rewardNormal livecasino.io terms and conditions still apply, including multi-account restrictionsWe hope you enjoy!Fl√°vio from livecasino.io team
